sentence: Do you expect driverless cars to take over your city in 2024? Tesla's plan to develop a fully driverless taxi has prompted RBC Capital Markets to raise their price target on the company's shares
Analyst Tom Narayan predicts robotaxis and autonomous vehicles in general could "transform society more than anything else in our lifetimes," saving "millions of lives and trillions of hours
" He believes that given the value and convenience they offer and lower pricing, consumers will switch away from private car ownership
Tesla recently struck deals allowing Ford and General Motors vehicles to use Tesla's Supercharger network, which many believe will enable software licensing in the future
